dct_title_s: Geological map of the world / design, compilation, synthesis and drawing, Philippe Bouysse (CGMW) ; Commission for the geological map of the world = Carte géologique du monde / conception, compilation, synthèse et dessin de la maquette, Philippe Bouysse (CGMW) ; Commission de la carte géologique du monde.
dct_description_sm: Shows areas of sedimentary, extrusive volcanic and endogenous rock and undifferentiated facies, ages of oceanic crust, hot spots, faults, and subduction zones. In upper margin: Commission for the Geological Map of the World/Commission de la carte géologique du monde; IUGS; United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization. Accompanying text: Geological map of the world at 1:35,000,000 : explanatory notes / by Philippe Bouysse. Includes notes. Ancillary maps: [Geological map of the northern hemisphere] -- [Geological map of the southern hemisphere].
dct_creator_sm: Commission for the Geological Map of the World
dct_publisher_sm: Paris, France : Printed by IGN (French National Geographic Institute).
